t: SHOPPING AT AN AMAZON GO STORE - AMAZON CUSTOMER SERVICE
s: At select Amazon Go locations, you'll be able to enter using a credit card or Amazon One. To enter using your credit card: Dip your credit card at the gate, wait for the check mark and walk in. To enter using Amazon One: Hover your palm above the device, wait for the orange check mark and walk in.
